attributes.action: Buy-In Proven US Homeland-Security & Municipal Databases
attributes.additional_details:
With a very-poor track-record of developing here-in-the-UK the opportunity to-buy off-the-shelf is ideal.
Largely self-funded, may-even turn-a-profit [UK-Citizens paying token-fee at local police-station to-use existing personnel-&-equipment]; ID is important-to-ALL & saves TAXPAYER-cash.  No-need for an ID-Card when people carry their fingerprints-&-DNA 24x7.
Those seeking US-Visa may expedite-the-process through reciprocal-arrangements.  UK Border-Control may save TAXPAYER-cash adopting off-the-shelf automated PFI security-checks; tunnel akin toilet-cubicle with living-fingerprint door-locks at both-ends.
Automated Home Office tracking of-those entering-&-leaving the UK is almost-FREE.

Digitally-capturing living-fingerprints, head-&-shoulders JPEG’s at schools, colleges, driving-examiners, banks... largely eliminates FRAUD.  Unconscious-admissions to-hospital require treatment-expedition, easily-achieved with near-instant-access to NHS-Records.
